name: The Reset
description:
Intro

You are testing an experimental suite capable of harnessing dark matter from around you.

The suite can reset your timeline and generate a "dark ghost" that will play out the previous actions in the current timeline.

This makes for challenging tests, in which, you must generate multiple dark ghosts to overcome the trials set out before you.

Controls:

  • 'Left', 'Right' Arrows
  • 'Up' to jump
  • 'Spacebar' to reset the timeline
  • 'R' to restart the level

Aim:

  • Collect all the dark matter (circles)
  • Only the dark ghosts can collect it
  • Dark ghosts will replay all your actions
  • Create a dark ghost by press 'spacebar'
  • Exit through the portal
